price: ߟߐ߲ߕߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߕߎߣߎ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ، ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߢߐ߲߮ ߡߊߢߌ߬ߣߌ߲߬ߞߊ߬ ߝߣߊ߫
arabic: فَعَمِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَهُمۡ لَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: faʿamiyat ʿalayhimu al-anbāu yawma-idhin fahum lā yatasāalūna
